mapper.select: SELECT MC.COMPANY_CD AS COMPANY_CODE , MC.COMPANY_NM , MC.COMPANY_NM_ENG , MC.BUSINESS_NO , MC.BUSINESS_TYPE , MC.BUSINESS_ITEM , MC.TEL_NO , MC.FAX_NO , MC.EMAIL , MC.REPRESENTATIVE_NM , MC.REPRESENTATIVE_NM_ENG , MC.ADDRESS , MC.ADDRESS_ENG , MC.DESCRIPTION , MC.USE_YN , MC.CREATE_BY , (SELECT MU.USER_NM FROM MOM_USER MU WHERE MU.COMPANY_CD = MC.COMPANY_CD AND MU.USER_NO = MC.CREATE_BY AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS CREATE_BY_NM , MC.CREATE_DATE , MC.UPDATE_BY , (SELECT MU.USER_NM FROM MOM_USER MU WHERE MU.COMPANY_CD = MC.COMPANY_CD AND MU.USER_NO = MC.UPDATE_BY AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS UPDATE_BY_NM , MC.UPDATE_DATE FROM MOM_COMPANY MC
SELECT MD.* , MD.DIVISION_CD AS DIVISION_CODE FROM MOM_DIVISION_V MD WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MD.DIVISION_CD
